name: Tomato Rarebit
author: PJ's kitchen
summary: Tomatoes flavor this rarebit made with Cheddar cheese. Serve over toast at tea time for a traditional snack. Great for a hot lunch during those cold winter days. Just add ham or sausage and serve with a salad to complete a evening dinner.
directions: Melt the butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat
Stir in flour until smooth, then continue to cook and stir until lightly browned, about 10 minutes
Gradually stir in the milk so that no lumps form and then simmer until thick, stirring the whole time
Stir together the baking soda and canned tomatoes; stir into the sauce
Whisk together the mustard and eggs; stir into the tomato sauce
Set the saucepan over a pot of barely simmering water (like a double boiler)
Stir in the cheese and season with salt and pepper
Continue to cook, stirring occasionally, until cheese has melted
